visualização de dados;Capacidade de interpretar dados operacionais e transformá-los em ações práticas de melhoria;Conhecimento básico de SQL ou outras ferramentas de consulta e manipulação de dados.Preferred QualificationsExperiência em ambientes logísticos, industriais, centros de distribuição ou operações de grande escala;Conhecimento em metodologias de melhoria contínua, como Lean, Kaizen e/ou Six Sigma;Experiência com ferramentas de BI (ex.: Power BI, QuickSight);Experiência no desenvolvimento e manutenção de dashboards e indicadores de desempenho (KPIs);Vivência em projetos de title: Data Scientist, Search Platforms and Data Quality (English)
description: Please submit your resume in English - we can only consider applications submitted in this language.Minimum qualifications:Master's degree in Statistics, Data Science, Mathematics, Physics, Economics, Operations Research, Engineering, or a related quantitative field.3 years of work experience using analytics to solve product or business problems, coding (e.g., Python, R, SQL), querying databases or statistical analysis, or a PhD degree.Ability to communicate in English fluently, to interact with internal stakeholders.Preferred qualifications:5 years of work experience using analytics to solve product or business problems, coding (e.g., Python, R, SQL), querying databases or statistical analysis, or a PhD degree.4 years of experience analyzing data and creating reports with statistical, quantitative modeling, and forecasting skills.3 years of experience in an applied research setting.Knowledge of statistics, and proficiency in one or more statistical software packages (e.g., R, SPSS, Stata, SAS).About The JobAt Google, data drives all of our decision-making. Quantitative Analysts work all across the organization to help shape Google's business and technical strategies by processing, analyzing and interpreting huge data sets. Using analytical excellence and statistical methods, you mine through data to identify opportunities for Google and our clients to operate more efficiently, from enhancing advertising efficacy to network infrastructure optimization to studying user behavior.
